title: Unique Coffee Tasting at Colombia Finca Las Juntas
description:
This 2024 Reserve coffee features notes of lychee and peach 🍑.
🌎 Growing Region: Latin America
🔥 Light Roast
🍊 Medium-High Acidity
⚖️ Medium Body
⛰️ Altitude 1350m
🌱 Pink Bourbon Variety
💧 Wet Processing with Anaerobic Fermentation (This type of processing refers to the fact that coffee cherries are cleaned of pulp after harvest and placed in tanks to ferment without being exposed to oxygen for 60h).
- Alessia Eftimie
